name: Alec Bradley - Trilogy - Exotic Maduro
additionalNotes: The Alec Bradley Trilogy collector’s Series of their innovative triangular shaped Trilogy line of cigars. The three blends that make up the series- The Exotic Maduro features a tasty, oily, dark chocolatey Nicaraguan maduro wrapper. This mouthwatering capa is placed over a Honduran Connecticut-seed binder and long-filler leaves from Honduras and Nicaragua. This full-bodied toro delivers an invigorating smoking experience with its spicy and earthy notes tempered by an underlying sweetness.
